00020 /*! \file IntervalEntry.h This file defines types to store a sequence interval. */
00021 
00022 #ifndef _IntervalEntry_HEADER_
00023 #define _IntervalEntry_HEADER_
00024 
00025 #include <cstring>
00026 #include <list>
00027 #include <string>
00028 //
00029 
00030 /*! A type to define a sequence interval. */
00031 typedef struct _IntervalEntry
00032 {
00033         /*! The sequence name. */
00034         std::string seq;
00035 
00036         /*! The probe set name. */
00037         std::string probeSetName;
00038 
00039         /*! The start position. */
00040         int start;
00041 
00042         /*! The stop position. */
00043         int stop;
00044 
00045         /*! The overlap score. */
00046         float overlap;
00047 
00048         /*! The strand, either "+" or "-". */
00049         char strand;
00050 
00051         /*! The size of the region. Assumes 0 based index for start and 1 based for stop.
00052          * @return The size of the region.
00053          */
00054         int size() const { return stop - start; }
00055 
00056 } IntervalEntry;
00057 
00058 /*! An STL list of interval entries. */
00059 typedef std::list<IntervalEntry> IntervalEntryList;
00060 
00061 /*! An STL list iterator of interval entries. */
00062 typedef std::list<IntervalEntry>::iterator IntervalEntryListIt;
00063 
00064 /*! An STL list iterator of interval entries. */
00065 typedef std::list<IntervalEntry>::const_iterator IntervalEntryListConstIt;
00066 
00067 
00068 #endif
